casebody.data:
HAARHUIS
v.
CHEEK 332P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2018 Stephanie W. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Walter K. Burton, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Cam Bordman, Attorney at Law, Charles M. Ivey, III, Attorney at Law, Darren A. McDonough, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cheek, Emily. J. David Stradley, Attorney at Law, Robert P. Holmes, IV, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Leto Copeley, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Haarhuis, Joris (Administrator), et al.

Meghan Wray Deutsch-Blanco, Attorney at Law.

Cynthia L. Van Horne, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Burton, Sue & Anderson, LLP. John P. Barringer, Attorney at Law, Jeffrey B. Kuykendal, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Universal Insurance Company.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of October 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of October 2018."
